DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety and effectiveness of Restylane® when used for lip augmentation.
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Efficacy Study of Restylane® in Lip Augmentation
DOC.criteria: Must meet established lip fullness criteria Allergic to injectable hyaluronic acid, local topical anesthetics or nerve blocking agents; Conditions/procedures that could interfere with lip fullness evaluations
